attributes.action: make it illegal for under 20s to buy and drink alcohol on the streets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i want to make it illegal for under 20s to buy and drink alcohol on the streets, i think if this law is passed it will dramaticly cut down on youth crime and help to solve our ever growing yob culture

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/UnderageDrinking/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
